content.question: In context, the phrase “the cradle of civilization” in the eighth paragraph might best be interpreted to imply both

choices.label: Jackson’s nostalgia for his childhood and his desire to better himself
Jackson’s return to his origins and the possibility of a kind of rebirth
Jackson’s memories of Julia and the long duration of their friendship
Jackson’s interest in the past and the historical importance of York

content.answer: Jackson’s return to his origins and the possibility of a kind of rebirth

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
